thread.title: The Two Faces of January Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Hulu & Peacock
thread.title_full: The Two Faces of January Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Hulu & Peacock

author: Sounak Sengupta
title: The Two Faces of January Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Hulu & Peacock
text:
If you love thrillers,
The Two Faces of January is your poison, and we provide all the necessary streaming details. The film follows Rydal, a fraudulent tour guide in Greece, who sets his sights on an American couple. However, his schemes take an unanticipated turn when he learns that the man is a murderer, leading Rydal to become entangled in helping them flee the country.
Here’s how you can watch and stream The Two Faces of January via streaming services such as Hulu & Peacock.
Is The Two Faces of January available to watch via streaming?
Yes, The Two Faces of January is available to watch via streaming on Hulu & Peacock.
Directed by Hossein Amini, the film begins with New York con man Chester MacFarland and his wife Colette touring Greece in 1962. While traversing through the Acropolis, they meet Rydal Keener, an estranged American, and invite him to dinner. When Rydal returns to the hotel to return a bracelet the couple had left in the taxi, he discovers a deadly secret — Chester accidentally kills a private detective seeking restitution for his swindles. The movie follows the trio hastily fleeing the hotel and leaving behind their passports.
The film stars Viggo Mortensen as Chester MacFarland, Kirsten Dunst as Colette MacFarland, and Oscar Isaac as Rydal Keener. The supporting cast includes Yigit Ozsener, Daisy Bevan, David Warshofsky, and Omiros Poulakis.
Watch The Two Faces of January streaming via Hulu
The Two Faces of January is available to watch via streaming on Hulu. Subscribe to Hulu for a seamless streaming experience, offering a diverse range of genres and award-winning originals.
You can watch the show via Hulu by following these steps:
- Go to
Hulu.com/welcome
- Select ‘Start Your Free Trial’
- Choose a plan:
- $7.99 per month or $79.99 per year (With Ads)
- $17.99 per month (No Ads)
Hulu (With Ads) is the cheapest option, providing users access to Hulu’s streaming library with commercials. Hulu (No Ads) is the service’s premium option, providing access to its library without any advertisements. There are also several bundles available with Hulu that pair the service with Disney Plus and ESPN Plus, along with Live TV plans that also include many live TV channels.
Watch The Two Faces of January streaming via Peacock
The Two Faces of January is available to watch via streaming on Peacock. Experience the convenience of on-the-go entertainment with Peacock’s extensive collection and the flexibility to watch anytime, anywhere.
You can watch via Peacock by following these steps:
- Go to
PeacockTV.com
- Click ‘Get Started’
- Choose your payment plan
- $5.99 per month or $59.99 per year (premium)
- $11.99 per month or $119.99 per year (premium plus
- Create your account
- Enter your payment details
Peacock’s Premium account provides access to over 80,000+ hours of TV, movies, and sports, including current NBC and Bravo Shows, along with 50 always-on channels. Premium Plus is the same plan but with no ads (save for limited exclusions), along with allowing users to download select titles and watch them offline and providing access to your local NBC channel live 24/7.
The Two Faces of January’s synopsis is as follows:
“1962. A con artist, his wife, and a dangerous stranger are caught up in the murder of a private detective and are forced to try and escape Athens.”
NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
